presentationColumns.name: Ordered Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of quantity net of cancelled quantity at distribution level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Ordered Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Original Ordered Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of quantity including cancelled quantity at distribution level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Original Ordered Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Cancelled Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of cancelled quantity at distribution level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Cancelled Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Consignment Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of consigned quantity at distribution level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Consignment Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Billed Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of billed quantity at distribution level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Billed Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Delivered Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as  sum of delivered quantity at distribution level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Delivered Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Received Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as  sum of received quantity at schedule level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Received Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Shipped Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of shipped quantity at schedule level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Shipped Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Accepted Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of accepted quantity at schedule level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Accepted Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Rejected Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of rejected quantity at schedule level.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Rejected Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Over Receipt Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric shows quantity that is received more than purchase order quantity.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Over Receipt Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Purchase Order Count
presentationColumns.description: Count of distinct purchase order headers.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Purchase Order Count

presentationColumns.name: Purchase Order Lines Count
presentationColumns.description: Count of distinct purchase order lines.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Purchase Order Lines Count

presentationColumns.name: Requisition Lines Count
presentationColumns.description: Count of distinct requisition lines associated in purchase order distributions.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Requisition Lines Count

presentationColumns.name: Average Number of Revisions
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as average of revision number of a purchase orders.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Average Number of Revisions

presentationColumns.name: Amendments Count
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as average amendments done for a purchase orders.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Amendments Count

presentationColumns.name: Internal Amendments Count
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as average number of internal amendments for a purchase orders.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Internal Amendments Count

presentationColumns.name: Supplier Amendments Count
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as average number of supplier initiated amendments for a purchase orders.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Supplier Amendments Count

presentationColumns.name: Pre Processing Lead Time
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as average difference between purchase order approval date and purchase order creation date for version zero.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Pre Processing Lead Time

presentationColumns.name: Approvers Count
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as average number of approvers in a purchase order.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Approvers Count

presentationColumns.name: PR to PO Cycle Time
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as average difference between purchase order creation date and requisition line approval date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.PR to PO Cycle Time

presentationColumns.name: PO Open Cycle Time
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as average difference between purchase order implement date for version zero and purchase order creation date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.PO Open Cycle Time

presentationColumns.name: PO Close Cycle Time
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as average difference between purchase order close date  and purchase order creation date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.PO Close Cycle Time

presentationColumns.name: Negotiation to PO Cycle Time
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as average difference between purchase order approval date for version zero  and negotiation line creation date for purchase orders created from negotiations.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Negotiation to PO Cycle Time

presentationColumns.name: Requisition Based PO %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of distribution with requisition references divided by count of total distributions.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Requisition Based PO %

presentationColumns.name: Buyers Count
presentationColumns.description: Count of distinct buyers.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Buyers Count

presentationColumns.name: Payment Terms Count
presentationColumns.description: Count of distinct payment terms
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Payment Terms Count

presentationColumns.name: Supplier Count
presentationColumns.description: Count of distinct Supplier.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Supplier Count

presentationColumns.name: Suppliers Count
presentationColumns.description: Count of distinct Supplier.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Suppliers Count

presentationColumns.name: Open PO Count
presentationColumns.description: Count of purchase order header status equal to 'Open' and 'Closed for Receiving.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Open PO Count

presentationColumns.name: Closed PO Count
presentationColumns.description: Count of purchase order header status equal to 'Closed for Invoicing,'Closed' and 'Finally Closed'.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Closed PO Count

presentationColumns.name: Rejected Quantity %
presentationColumns.description: This metric shows Rejected Quantity percentage to overall Receipt Quantity  for a given period.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Rejected Quantity %

presentationColumns.name: Over Receipt Quantity %
presentationColumns.description: This metric shows Over Receipt Quantity percentage to overall Receipt Quantity  for a given period.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Over Receipt Quantity %

presentationColumns.name: Cancelled Quantity %
presentationColumns.description: This metric shows Cancelled Quantity percentage to overall Ordered Quantity for a given period.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Purchase Orders.Cancelled Quantity %
